Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Includes gender equality in the social and economic equity plan of the New York state cannabis control board
Summary: Includes transgender, gender non-conforming and non-binary individuals in the social and economic equity plan of the New York state cannabis control board relating to the awarding of adult-use cannabis licenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to including gender equality in the social and economic equity plan of the New York state cannabis control board
